title: Bricklaying & Brickwork
desc: Professional bricklayers for new builds, alterations and repairs. Clean lines and durable finishes.
longDesc: From face brick to structural blockwork, our licensed teams deliver crisp lines, consistent joints and safe, tidy work sites that keep your build moving.

title: Retaining Walls
desc: Engineered block/stone retaining walls, drainage and footings to spec.
longDesc: We build retaining walls to spec with correct drainage, reinforcement and footings so the structure performs long term without surprise movement.

title: Concrete Driveways & Slabs
desc: Excavation, formwork, steel, pour and finish for driveways, paths and slabs.
longDesc: Driveways and slabs delivered cleanly with the right base, steel and finish. We plan access, set levels and hand over a neat surface ready to use.

title: Landscaping & Hardscaping
desc: Integrated outdoor works: edges, steps, beds and preparation.
longDesc: We combine structural elements with practical prep to deliver outdoor areas that look great and drain/perform well long term.

title: Paving
desc: Long-lasting patios, paths and entries with neat cuts and compaction.
longDesc: We deliver patios and pathways with tight joints, clean cuts and solid compaction so they stay flat and sharp.
